Dialogue.Page: The strange rocks that intrigued the Nomai and Hearthians alike will soon have no one left to observe them ever again.
Tephra and Galena noticed one of these quantum shards in the museum disappearing from time to time.
This quantum shard traveled to a sanctuary within Timber Hearth, built to protect the Hearthians from a supernova the Nomai hoped to induce.
The few Hearthians who hid within this sanctuary would be among the only survivors of the Interloper's arrival.
We were never able to learn what was causing ghost matter to begin to evaporate.
